values.value: A thousand of us A'i live in Ecuador.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Toya'caen Colombiani quentsu canse'fa ba've mil

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Poiyi canqque'su a'indeccungi afapa canse'fa a'ingae

values.value: In all of our communities, we speak A'ingae.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Ingitangi na'ensuma panzaye injanda simba'fai'ccu simba'fa

values.value: If we want food from our rivers, we use hooks, lines, and nets.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Tsampisu aña'cho'ma panzayetangi a'mbian'fa ufa'ccocco satama

values.value: If we want food from our forests, we use blowguns and spears.
Now, we also use rifles and shotguns.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: poi a'i can'qqueni tsu coragandeccu canse'fa

values.value: There are shamans in all our communities.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Cayambe 'cco=ta=cco=ya ansunde=pa=qui atte=ya pa'cco a'i andema.

values.value: If you climb Cayambe mountain, you can see all of Cofán land.
traveled all the way from the Andean foothills

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Ingi a'indeccu gi canse'fa trece canqque'ni

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Toya'caensi canse'fa a'indeccuja fuesu andeniqque San Pablo Puerto Bolivar

values.value: We also live in the villages of other peoples: San Pablo and Puerto Bolívar.
The natural protected areas that we care for are:

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Va andema tsu ingi a'i guardaparquendeccu cuiraje'fa

values.value: Our Cofán park guards protect this land.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Ecuadorfaningi ambian'fa andema cuatrocientos mil hectáreama ti'tsse

values.value: In Ecuador, we have legal control over more than 1,000,000 acres of land.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Va proyecto tsu ingima fuiteya atesuye tayopisu andema

values.value: This project will help us to learn about our ancestral territory.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: caen tsu ingi dushundeccumbe du'shu'qque atesu'faye

values.value: It will help make sure that our children's children will know about it too.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: tsaiccungi osha'fa'ya ingi andema toengatsse isui

values.value: With this, we will be able to regain control of our traditional territory.

sentences.speaker: S1
sentences.text: Va pa'cco ingi canse'cho ande tsu ingi ande

values.value: All of this land is our land.
